overview:
Paul is VP, Business Development at BenchBucket. Paul has a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Commerce from McMaster University, majoring in Marketing and Sales.

Paul also studied business development and planning while at McMaster. He has proven this while working as an Account Representative in the automotive industry for the past four years, where he has won awards for outstanding performance within his company of employ.

Paul has also been quite involved in sports over the years. Paul grew up playing rep hockey, and still plays organized menâ€™s league hockey in Brantford. Paul is also an alumnus of the Great Lakes Football League, Canadian Junior Football League, and the McMaster Marauders Football team.
